title: Betrayed by Covenant Cove
description: A storm is coming! Are you ready?NOVELETTE #2 Includes Two Preview Chapters for DESTRUCTION BY COVENANT COVE!!!The Forces of Darkness have consumed Doctor Carson Bartholomew convincing him he his God! The banished and those who escaped the consuming darkness surrounding Covenant Cove are growing in number.Sylvia and her three friends broke the rules. Now they are being turned out of the safety of their underground home to the outside world. A world the Cove taught, war and greed destroyed. After a year of living on the streets, Jessica and Gregory give them a second chance. A chance that may not last long as plans are in motion to wipe the global slate clean. This is the second novelette in this series, leading up to the brewing destruction that Covenant Cove is planning. Donâ€™t miss out on the storm that is brewing! Read now to prepare yourself for the battle that will inevitably come.
author: R.L. Dubbert
